roleset.name: cause to undergo fermentation

example.name: passive, no Agent
example.text: [The water used [*]]-43 comes from the Chishui river that [*T*-42]flows overcinnabar quality soil and selectively uses such locally produced raw materials as sorghum , high quality wheat ,etc. and is fermented [*-43] during the period from the Chinese Dragon Boat Festival to the Double NinthFestival .
example.arg: during the period from the Chinese Dragon Boat Festival to the Double NinthFestival

roleset.note: FERMENT-V NOTES: Framed by Neville. (from ferment.01-v)
FERMENTATION-N NOTES: Based on ontonotes nouns. Comparison to ferment.0-v. Ferment.01 is a member of VN class entity_specific_cos-45.5. Framed byKatie. (from fermentation.01-n)
